M

main(String[]) - Static method in class war.Menu
 
MAX_DECK_SIZE - Static variable in class war.Deck
 
MAX_TURN_NUMBER - Static variable in class war.Turn
 
Menu - Class in war
The class which contains the main method for running War Allows a user to input a variation of War to play: Two players play cards until one deck is empty with the winner claiming cards after a war is run, or until 4000 rounds have passed. Two players play cards until their decks are empty, keeping score with the cards that are won in each war Three players play with the same rules as variation 2.
Menu() - Constructor for class war.Menu
